alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clay; Randolph; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Clay, southeastern Randolph, northwestern Calhoun and southern Terrell Counties in southwestern Georgia through 315 PM EDT... At 232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Shellman to 7 miles southeast of Fort Gaines. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morgan, Dawson, Edison, Shellman, Bronwood, Bellville, Bluffton, Harrisons Mill, Pachitla, Carnegie, Moye, Cordrays Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P, Graves, Fountain Bridge, Goffs Mill, Shivers Mill, Aycock Mill, Martins Crossroads and Suttons Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
